thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Laurie Annan
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Laurie Annan

author: Laurie Annan
title: Laurie Annan
text:
The people at both end - when getting the vehicle and returning it were very professional and very quick with their service.
There was a few stone chips in the windscreen when we picked up the vehicle and over the next few days one of the stone chips turned into a glass split and extended to about 8-10 cm over the week.
We thought we may have to pay for [at least some of] the repair - but as this was indicated when we picked the car up there was no penalty.
We will be returning to NZ again next year with other people and will definitely use Omega again.
